message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product.  I'm willing to let it go for $110.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $85 right now. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm happy to come down a bit, but $85 is just a little too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $95? I'm confident you'll find this product worth every penny.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $95 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm firm on my previous offer of $85.  Let's make a deal.
Bob, I understand you're sticking to $85, but I'm really at my limit with that price. I'm willing to go down to $90, but I can't go any lower.  This is a great deal for you, so let's close this out.
